name: @skyway-sdk/common
description: The official Next Generation JavaScript SDK for SkyWay
author: NTT Communications Corp.

scripts.compile: npm run compile:tsc && npm run compile:esbuild
scripts.graph: dependency-cruiser --include-only '^src' --output-type dot src | dot -T svg > docs/dependencygraph.svg
scripts.publish:npm: npx can-npm-publish --verbose && npm run build && npm publish --access public
